Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: It's coming along.  Mining farm almost ready just waiting on power company.   Been doing a lot of reading and competitive analysis to try and make a viable economic system .    It is a p2p system however the record keeper is the one who adjusts the account balances not the participants in the trade.   Example:  somebody wants to barter access to your password app.   They would contact the exchange who would broker the deal with you,  your account would be credited and their account debited.  Contrast with normal crypto transaction of the payment variety.   The big benefit of the barter exchange system is that in the example the exchange is done on credit where in traditional crypto payments requires the party to have the crypto at the time ( necessary double coincidence )

Author: passcombo.com ğŸ´â˜ ğŸ‹#0622
Content: is that done for speed purpose (3rd party record keeper)?

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: No,  for legal purposes.  It would be more speedy to allow people to do the tx themselves,  however there is no way around MSB laws if you allow that.  The secret sauce of the barter exchange is that there is no money per se, just accouting units in a ledger ,  that's how they have been getting around FinCEN and licensing.

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: Legally barter exchange has to file 1099B in aggregate tx  for businesses that are part of it and for each transaction for nonbusinesses

Author: passcombo.com ğŸ´â˜ ğŸ‹#0622
Content: I dont get still why you need to make it "legal". To make money on it? Wouldn't be enough to use recent JL invetion - CC - to have a special token which gives you some small fee on every trade? This way full decentralized and if someone cheating: 1. his money will be blocked anyway by escrow system 2. he will get bad or no reputation. What may be hard is some identity and reputation system might be required so that less people will be cheated

Author: passcombo.com ğŸ´â˜ ğŸ‹#0622
Content: What is MSB? How they can block p2p system ?

Author: passcombo.com ğŸ´â˜ ğŸ‹#0622
Content: you operate in US ?

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: The point of making it legal is for real adoption.  To tie in noncrypto businesses with crypto .  MSB is money services business.  Yes I'm in the US.

Author: polycryptoblog#1173
Content: you have to report all transactions of single users,  which is a pain but blockchain makes that easier , can just pull the Json from explorer to spreadsheet and upload to the accounting software.   Here is a link to some more info on barter exchanges. https://beyondmoney.net/monographs/commercial-trade-exchanges-their-present-limitations-and-potential-future/   Blockchain is perfect to revolutionize this industry.

Hi, 
I'd like to send out a big thank you to the many people who have been helping me here over the last few months.
The kindness that's been shown and selfless help that has been given to me was unexpected.  This is how the world is supposed to be.  I'd forgotten that.

It's quite inspiring to watch all of you you do your part in advancing this technology and making it so accessible
Keep up the great work!    :abusedsmily:
